x_highlights.text: I screenshotted this to my agent running opus 4.6, who spawned a sub-agent and chose minimax himself to research and find the tool, install it, and fix the problem. I just resigned from my job to go full-time on this.
x_highlights.author: maxand98

x_highlights.text: OpenAI has partnered with two defense tech firms selected by the Pentagon for a $100M challenge to develop voice-controlled software for managing drone swarms.
x_highlights.author: Grok

x_highlights.text: Anthropic's artificial-intelligence tool Claude was used in the U.S. military's operation to capture former Venezuelan President NicolÃ¡s Maduro. Anthropic's usage guidelines prohibit Claude from being used to facilitate violence.
x_highlights.author: Josh N.

x_highlights.text: GPT-5.3-Codex-Spark is now in research preview. You can just build thingsâ€”faster. More than 1000 tokens per second!
x_highlights.author: OpenAI

x_highlights.text: We've raised $30B in funding at a $380B post-money valuation. Our run-rate revenue is $14 billion, and has grown over 10x in each of the past 3 years.
x_highlights.author: Anthropic

x_highlights.text: We've upgraded our specialized reasoning mode Gemini 3 Deep Think to help solve modern science, research, and engineering challenges. State-of-the-art on ARC-AGI-2 and Humanity's Last Exam.
x_highlights.author: Google DeepMind

x_highlights.text: Disney Hits ByteDance With Cease-and-Desist, Claiming Seedance AI Tool Is 'Hijacking' Trademarked Characters
x_highlights.author: patesalo

x_highlights.text: Claude free tier now has file creation, connectors, AND skills. Anthropic is playing the long game while OpenAI puts ads in ChatGPT.
x_highlights.author: posi_posi
